citations.narrative:
Part of the wooden door to the indoor housing of the porcupine enclosure was jagged and had several exposed
screwheads. This could cause the animal to become injured. The facility must be maintained in good repair in order to
prevent injury to the animals. The facility must correct this issue.
**********Correct by November 15, 2023

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A plan had not been documented for environmental enhancement for the birds housed at the facility. A species specific
plan to promote the psychological well-being of birds must be developed and documented and approved by the attending
veterinarian. This is required in order to verify that the phycological needs of birds are being met. The plan must be in
accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted professional standards and be made available
during an inspection by APHIS officials.
*******Correct by November 24, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Part of the wooden door to the indoor housing of the porcupine enclosure was jagged and had several exposed 
screwheads. This could cause the animal to become injured. The facility must be maintained in good repair in order to 
prevent injury to the animals. The facility must correct this issue.  
**********Correct by November 15, 2023 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A plan had not been documented for environmental enhancement for the birds housed at the facility. A species specific 
plan to promote the psychological well-being of birds must be developed and documented and approved by the attending 
veterinarian. This is required in order to verify that the phycological needs of birds are being met. The plan must be in 
accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted professional standards and be made available 
during an inspection by APHIS officials.  
*******Correct by November 24, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
